video_title: The Next Billion-Dollar SAAS Idea? | Scott Belsky on Where It Happens

content_profile.title: The Next Billion-Dollar SAAS Idea? | Scott Belsky on Where It Happens

key_takeaways: Solution: Create a central consumer profile platform that businesses can access via API (Difficulty: advanced)
Growth Tactic: Start with businesses in a single city to create network effects (Channel: b2b-partnerships)
Strategy: B2B SaaS model where hospitality businesses pay to access consumer preference data via API
Startup Opportunity: Consumer preference sharing platform for hospitality industry (Target: Two-sided: consumers who want personalized experie)

startup_ideas.title: Consumer preference sharing platform for hospitality industry
startup_ideas.target_market: Two-sided: consumers who want personalized experiences and hospitality businesses wanting customer data
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Eliminates need to repeatedly share preferences and enables instant personalization
startup_ideas.business_model: B2B SaaS - businesses pay to access consumer preference data via API
startup_ideas.validation: Start in a given city with local hotels and restaurants

trend_opportunities.title: Consumer desire for data control and proactive sharing rather than passive extra
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Build platforms that let consumers control and proactively share their data

practical_next_steps: Validate one of the startup ideas with target market interviews
